## How to submit

We accept several types of contributions:

- **Code snippets** as GitHub Gists
- **Package vignettes** (link to published vignette)
- **Data preparation workflows**
- **Tutorials or walkthroughs**

### Submission criteria

All submissions should:

- Be relevant to working with delayed or revised
  surveillance data
- Include a clear description of what the example does
- State the language and any package dependencies
- Be self-contained and runnable where possible, or
  link to a reproducible resource
- Use simulated or publicly available data (no
  protected health information)

### How to submit

**Open an issue** using the
[community example template](https://github.com/epinowcast/GuideToSTLTReportingDelays/issues/new?template=community-example.yml){target="_blank"}
with:

- A link to your gist, vignette, or resource
- The type of contribution
- Which challenge and approach it covers
- A brief description

We will review the submission and add it to the table.

See the [contributing guide](../contributing.qmd) for
general contribution guidelines.
